text: Castle in the Ground is a 2019 Canadian-American drama film, written and directed by Joey Klein. The film explores a teenager's developing opioid addiction after the death of his terminally ill mother. It stars Alex Wolff, Imogen Poots, Tom Cullen, Keir Gilchrist and Neve Campbell. It had its world premiere at the Toronto International Film Festival on September 5, 2019. It is scheduled to be released in the United States and Canada on May 15, 2020, by Gravitas Ventures and Pacific Northwest Pictures. ==Cast== * Alex Wolff as Henry Fine * Imogen Poots as Ana * Tom Cullen as Jimmy * Keir Gilchrist as Polo Boy * Neve Campbell as Rebecca Fine * Kiowa Gordon as Stevie * Star Slade as Rachel ==Production== In March 2019, it was announced Alex Wolff, Imogen Poots, Neve Campbell, Keir Gilchrist and Tom Cullen had joined the cast of the film, with Klein directing. ==Release== It had its world premiere at the Toronto International Film Festival on September 5, 2019. Shortly after, Gravitas Ventures acquired U.S. distribution rights to the film and set it for a May 15, 2020, release. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2019 films Category:Canadian films Category:American films Category:Canadian drama films Category:American drama films Category:Films about drugs Category:Films shot in Greater Sudbury Category:Films directed by Joey Klein Category:Films set in Northern Ontario Category:Greater Sudbury in fiction
title: Castle in the Ground
